title: The client, engaged in shooting VR videos with a 360-degree camera, required a platform to distribute and sell their content.
firstText: The goal was to create an application that could host these VR videos, providing users with a virtual tour experience, complete with sound and voice acting to narrate the story of each place.
secondText: This application needed to be available on multiple VR platforms, including iOS, Android, Oculus, and Pico.
